text: "Angel of the Morning" is a 1967 song written by Chip Taylor and was originally recorded by Evie Sands and first charted by Merrille Rush. It went to number 1 in Canada and number 7 in the United States. In 1981 it was covered by Juice Newton for her sixth studio album Juice. It went to number 4 in the United States and Switzerland, number 1 in Canada and number 5 in New Zealand. title: Angel of the Morning
